::Rodimus Prime::

Rodimus continues to move, keeping the distance relative to team 1, taking team 2's position.

Kraftlos <kraftlos@...> wrote:                                  Lord Perseus gave a signal, then opened the door to the tunnel.

"Time to figure out what this is all about!" he said into the radio.  "Teams are now moving into the mission area."

Lord Perseus began moving along the street, first east, then north toward the port, he had the team wait about a block before the ramp so he could be certain his backup was in position. 



On 3/25/07, Richard Allen <roborick007@...> wrote:                                    ::Rodimus Prime::

With Team 1 in place, Rodimus heads to the exit point of the tunnels, taking Team 2's position. Rodimus takes his stance, rifle drawn again.

Rodimus: Good luck, everyone. 

Nic <warriorazure@...> wrote:
                              Doc: Rodimus, come on, Team 1's in place!
 
 He pressed on a bit faster.
 
 Dinobot, outside, was still meditating. He had captured both Trelos's 
 transmission and Hydras's answer. He smirked mentally. But he also
 heard the shudder, the barely perceptible trembling underground.  The
 base was being protected somehow. First generation inspiration?
 Possibly, but that also meant he had to be ready.
 
 He stood up, not yet taking a combat stance. He was still waiting.
 They are Maximals and wouldn't fire first after all.
